customer_addr:
570 E Anderson St
Idaho Falls, ID 83401

citations.narrative:
The entire bottom tray of an enclosure in the upstairs mammal housing area containing six sugar gliders is coated with
food waste and excreta. Additional old food waste and debris is on the floor surrounding the outside of the enclosure. A
staff member stated the tray is cleaned weekly.
Food waste, debris, and excreta shall be removed from the primary enclosures as often as necessary to prevent
contamination of the animals and to minimize disease hazards and reduce odors.
To be corrected by 7/10/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Ashley Alger n

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
The entire bottom tray of an enclosure in the upstairs mammal housing area containing six sugar gliders is coated with 
food waste and excreta. Additional old food waste and debris is on the floor surrounding the outside of the enclosure. A 
staff member stated the tray is cleaned weekly.  
Food waste, debris, and excreta shall be removed from the primary enclosures as often as necessary to prevent 
contamination of the animals and to minimize disease hazards and reduce odors.  
To be corrected by 7/10/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors:
